author: terence0083
content: Same here. For Prysm. It had to do with "miss" listen / account for all attestations at the end of initial syncing. Because of that, when a node first syncs to head, it'll think the latest correct head is not viable due to check point missmatch

author: cem_ozer
content: We had it due to a concurrency issue between on block handler and process head method. Basically our ProtoArray implementation and our Store was not in sync. It's fixed now, and sync should be running smoothly. Although after sync we still have this bug to wrestle with: https://github.com/PegaSysEng/teku/issues/1713, we're getting there ðŸ™‚
